title: Open Channel Management - HydraulicSimulationScenario
description: Made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems)

type.description: Property. it has to be HydraulicSimulationScenario. NGSI-LD Entity Type

hasInputOpenChannelSystem.description: Property. The URI of the OpenChannelSystem this result is referring to

hasSimulationResult.description: Property. the URI of the HydraulicSimulationScenario this result has been computed

targetValues.description: Property. The set of target values defined by the user before the simulation

waterAttribute.description: Property. A sub-property (e.g., flow). A water attribute issued from the above data models. It follows fully this data model and it could be a property or a relationship. It contains the target values for specified properties, defined before the simulation

targetURI.description: Relationship. The CrossSection these target values refer to

inputParameters.description: Property. The set of modifications to be applied to the water system for the simulation

waterAttribute.description: Property. A sub-property. A water attribute issued from the above data models. It follows fully this data model and it could be a property or a relationship

targetURI.description: Relationship. The CrossSection these target values refer to

createdBy.description: Property. The user created this HydraulicSimulationScenario. It can be a UniqueId or a fullName

duration.description: Property. Duration of the simulation, given in seconds. Units:'seconds'

hydraulicTimeStep.description: Property. Determines how often the hydraulic state of the network is calculated. Given in seconds. Units:'seconds'

flowUnits.description: Property. Units in which flow rates are expressed in the simulation. Enum:'CFS, GPM, MGD, IMGD, AFD, LPS, LPM, MLD, CMH, CMD'

startSimulationTime.description: Property. Time of day at which the simulation begins

endSimulationTime.description: Property. Time of day at which the simulation ends

flowConvergenceAccuracy.description: Property. Criterion to determine whether the target flow has been established (difference between the real and target flow)

modelParameters.description: Property. Description of the set of modifications to be applied to the water system for the simulation
